token.description: The LOST token is Lost World's governance token, as well as the token distributed as rewards for users of the protocol. The ERC-20 token has a maximum supply of 50M tokens, had a private sale of 9.5% of its supply and a public sale of 4% of its supply. 35% of its supply is allocated for reward distributions.

platforms.name: Lost Worlds
platforms.description: Lost Worlds is a location-based NFT platform, enabling protocols to launch NFT collections collectible by physically moving around the world, and users to curate their portfolio while trading with others.

platforms.name: Pangolin
platforms.description: Pangolin is a community-driven decentralized exchange, up and running since the beginning of the Avalanche chain. They also offer limit orders as well as staking services.
